name: Baja Shrimp Tacos
author: Brittier
summary: The sauce gives these shrimp tacos a delicious kick!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ cup canola oil, or as needed
½ pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
½ medium head red cabbage, cut into small strips
directions: Combine beer, flour, salt, and ground black pepper in a bowl
Let batter sit at room temperature for 1 hour
Stir mayonnaise, chile-garlic sauce, and mirin together in a bowl to form the baja sauce
Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Dip shrimp in prepared batter; place in the fryer until golden brown, about 2 1/2 minutes
Heat tortillas 1 at a time on a skillet over medium heat until warm to the touch, about 1 minute
Fill each tortilla with an even amount of shrimp, baja sauce, red cabbage, and cilantro
